      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Breaking a circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen eines Stromkreises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rupture d'un circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quebrando um circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rompere un circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπάσιμο ενός κυκλώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Romper un circuito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a simple circuit, connecting a bulb to a cell (top). A break in a circuit can be made with a switch (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen einfachen Stromkreis 
und schließt eine Birne an eine Zelle an (Oberseite). Ein Bruch
in einem Stromkreis kann mit einem Schalter (Unterseite) gebildet 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un circuit simple, 
reliant une ampoule à une cellule (dessus). Une rupture dans un
circuit peut être faite avec un commutateur (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um circuito simples, 
conectando um bulbo a uma pilha (alto). Uma ruptura em um 
circuito pode ser feita com um interruptor (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un circuito semplice,
collegante una lampadina ad una cellula (parte superiore). Una 
rottura in un circuito può essere fatta con un interruttore (parte 
inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει απλό κύκλωμα, που 
συνδέει έναν βολβό με ένα κύτταρο (κορυφή). Ένα σπάσιμο 
σε ένα κύκλωμα μπορεί να γίνει με έναν διακόπτη (κατώτατο 
σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un circuito simple, 
conectando un bulbo con una célula (tapa). Una rotura en un 
circuito se puede hacer con un interruptor (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
